---
### Exempel 1

Nedan är ett exempel på graf.

```{r, echo = F}
require(rCharts)
a <- Highcharts$new()
a$chart(type = "spline")
a$series(data = c(0, 3, 2, 4, NA), 
  dashStyle = "longdash")
a$series(data = c(NA, 4, 1, 3, 1), 
  dashStyle = "shortdot")
a$print(tempfile(), include_assets = T, cdn = T)
```

### Exempel 2

```{r, echo = F}
require(rCharts)
a <- create_chart("code/swedish-parliament.R")
```
